description:
Leina is taken to Glemy Toto and held captive aboard the Endra. The now enraged Judau is confined to the Argama`s mess hall, but escapes with Elle`s help. The two of them launch in the Double Zeta and Mk-II to rescue Leina. But Gottn plans to use Leina as a hostage in order to defeat the Double Zeta.
Source: crunchyroll
